Nov 10, 2018

Password Evangelism: The Basics.

I’ve been thinking about writing this post for a while now. I’ve been my family and friends’ go-to IT guy for years. I’ve helped people set up their email on their computer, email on their phones, install Microsoft Office, configure Office 365, install printers… you name it. In my experience, I’ve learned a lot about good cybersecurity practice, such as what kind of passwords to use, and what is two-factor authentication.

Jul 31, 2015

Math Displayed Using MathJax

Problem

How to find the roots of \(ax^2 + bx + c = 0 \)

Answer

The roots are \[ x = \frac{-b\pm\sqrt{b^2-4ac}}{2a} \]
